#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Score.

== Name ==

*[CScore Score]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |

===  Documentation ===
        
			Type used to record 1 to 18 HoleScores.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...>  [CHoleScore hole]{1,18}  </...>
